name: @dnr-ui/tokens
description: Design Tokens to be used in DNR applications

scripts.transform: npm run transform:core && npm run transform:semantic && npm run transform:components
scripts.transform:semantic: npx token-transformer figma/tokens.json data/semantic.json core,semantic core --expandTypography=true --resolveReferences=true
scripts.transform:components: npx token-transformer figma/tokens.json data/components.json core,components core --expandTypography=true --resolveReferences=true
scripts.copy: cat ./package.json | grep -v '"private":' > build/package.json && cp README.md build
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run transform && npm run build:style-dictionary
scripts.pub: npm run copy && npm run build && npm publish ./build
